author: murat-karakaya
name: Nergis-Dark
description: The dark version of the Nergis theme. Nergis is a fork of Orchis and it is meant specifically for the cinnamon desktop. It brings many fixes and changes over orchis. (Like the new panel edit mode, a fix for workspace naming, and more). Nergis is meant to be a customizable Material Design theme. Click on the more 'info button' to learn how to customize it and to see more screenshots of it.
